resources.string:
There are 2 options available: Add Temperature and view the Weekly Weather. 
 Add Temperature Button: 
 1. Select the day you wish to add a temperature rule to. 
 2. Input the temperature you would like to set your home at. 
 3. Select the time you wish the temperature to change at. 
 4. Use update to set the rule or cancel to go back to the previous screen. 
 
 Weekly Weather Button: Displays the 7 day forecast. Great for knowing the temperature in advance. 
 
 Additional Note:
 1. Selecting a rule in the temperature list will allow you to update or delete the rule.
 2. Author and Version information can be found at the bottom of this page.
Click here to keep track of your daily intake of Food
Guide to why eating Healthy will make you feel BETTER

In order to use this interface properly, make sure you select an activity you wish to use. If using the tracker, type in your consumed food, calories, fats and carbs. The information entered will be stored in a database. You will be able to modify your entries as desired. You may also delete your entries when desired. This application also provides a nutritional guide by the standards of Health Canada, in order to make healthy choices. This application also provides information about why exercise is important. We hope you enjoy this application and is useful for your daily needs.
As a huge believer in exercise, here are some key points as to how exercise can benefit you:

1. Weight Control
 2. Prevent Health Problems
 3. Improves your mood
 4. Energy Booster
 5. Improves your sleep
 6. Can be a social activity
Below, you will find the link to Canada\'s Food Guide. This Guide will give you a recommended amount of servings of each type of food in a healthy diet.
Click the Button below to select a new Activity
Add a comment about your Activity
